title: Up and down
desc: Simulates an object that is thrown up and comes back down.

genes.ginit: C.GG==0 && C.A==0 -> V.STEP=12; V.A=-1; V.MG=5;V.color='yellow'; V.priority=10; V.DELAY=6; V.LIFE=V.DELAY;
genes.g3: V.MG==C.GG  && V.STEP > 0 && C.A ==2-> V.STEP=(V.STEP+V.A); V.MG=(C.GG+V.STEP+1); R; V.MG=0;
genes.g1: V.MG==C.GG && C.A==6 && V.STEP==0 -> V.A=1; V.STEP=1; SRM(4); V.MG=(C.GG + V.STEP); V.priority=10; V.color='green'; R;
